howToPlay.title: Welcome
howToPlay.text: I'm Agent T., and I will guide you through the features of our tic-tac-toe game.

howToPlay.title: Game Header
howToPlay.text: Here in the game's header section, you can find the game title and access various controls.

howToPlay.title: Home
howToPlay.text: This is the Home section. Click here to return to the main page of the game.

howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.text: Click here to learn how to play the game. This section provides detailed instructions and tips.

howToPlay.title: Developer
howToPlay.text: This section contains information about the developer behind it.

howToPlay.title: FAQ
howToPlay.text: Here you can find answers to frequently asked questions about the game.

howToPlay.title: Vote on Quine
howToPlay.text: If you like our project, you can vote for us here. Just click the upvote icon!

howToPlay.title: Github Repository
howToPlay.text:
Interested in how this game was built or want to contribute?
Click on the GitHub icon to visit our repository where you can find the source code and project details.

howToPlay.title: Sound Toggle
howToPlay.text:
This button lets you toggle the game's sound.
Click here to mute or unmute the game sounds.

howToPlay.title: Game Board
howToPlay.text:
This is the main tic-tac-toe board where the game is played.
Click on any empty cell to make a move.

howToPlay.title: Game Over Screen
howToPlay.text:
This is the game-over screen.
It appears when the game has ended, either in a win, loss, or tie. Here you'll see who won the game and have the option to restart the game.

howToPlay.title: Restart Button
howToPlay.text:
When you're ready to play again, just click this restart button.
It will reset the board and start a new game.

howToPlay.title: Game Score
howToPlay.text:
Here you can view the current game score.
This area updates with each move to show who's leading.

howToPlay.title: Player Wins
howToPlay.text:
This section displays the total number of games you've won.
Each victory in the game increases this count.

howToPlay.title: Game Ties
howToPlay.text:
This score counts the number of games that have ended in a tie.
It updates whenever a game ends without a winner.

howToPlay.title: Agent T. Wins
howToPlay.text:
This shows how many games the computer has won.
It's updated each time the computer scores a victory.

howToPlay.title: Over to you
howToPlay.text:
That's all for now!
I hope you enjoy playing the game.
Signing off, Agent T.
